short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arduino Programming & Serial Monitor App by codebender

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this App to allow codebender to talk to your Arduino (or arduino compatible) device. This way, you will be able to program your Arduino straight from your browser or open a Serial Monitor to communicate with it.

What is codebender?

codebender is the easiest, most advanced Arduino IDE for hobbyists, educators, and professionals. Write code easily in a great code editor, find bugs faster with the improved error output, and get inspiration by searching in the 100,000 Arduino sketches on the platform. Save your sketches on the cloud and forget problems like syncing your desktop with your laptop.

With more than 500 libraries built in, you’re sure to find the one you’re looking for, without spending time installing or maintaining it.
